/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the sky. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
